node.detail_zh: 患者屬「酒吧及樂隊」群組，是有關酒吧的顧客，過往健康良好。她為一名護士 ，於東華三院賽馬會復康中心 C 座 3 樓賽馬會頤康護理安老院及 C 座 5 樓賽馬會頤景護理安老院工作。 3 月 25 日出現發燒 、咳嗽及喉嚨痛症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient is one of the customers of the 'Bars and Bands' cluster. She has good past health. As a nurse, she works in the Tung Wah Hospital Ngai Chun Integrated Vocational Rehabilitation Centre in Block C on the 3rd floor and the Yee On Care and Attention Home in Block C on the 5th floor. She started having symptoms of fever, cough and sore throat on Mar 25.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 牽涉酒吧包括位於蘭桂坊的 Insomnia、尖沙咀的 All Night Long、灣仔的 Dusk till Dawn 及 Centre Stage。當中41人為樂隊成員及酒吧職員，31人是酒吧顧客，26人為第二代感染，4人為第三代感染，1人為第四代感染。
groups.description_en: This cluster involves Lan Kwai Fong's Insomnia, Knustford Terrance's All Night Long, and Centre Stage & Dusk Till Dawn in Wan Chai.  Among patients, 41 were band members and bar staff, 31 were bar customers, 26 were second-generation infections, 4 were third-generation infections, and 1 was fourth-generation infection.

node.location_zh: 東華三院賽馬會復康中心
node.remarks_zh: 患者分別於 3 月 24 日及 3 月 25 日於 5 樓及 3 樓的安老院工作，當值時有配戴口罩。記錄顯示患者於這兩天工作期間沒有發燒和身體不適。
node.remarks_en: The patient worked in the elderly homes located on 5/F and 3/F on Mar 24 and  Mar 25 respectively. She wore masks and did not feel unwell during the two days. Her body temperature was also normal.

node.location_zh: 諾士佛臺 9 號 All Night Long 酒吧
